questions.question: There …………………………. a discussion about the most effective ways to increase productivity.
questions.description: Arose is the simple past of arise.

questions.question: New difficulties have …………………………..
questions.description: Use the past participle form of the verb after have. Arisen is the past participle form of arise.

questions.question: I was ………………………….. by the loud noise.
I …………………………. her when we played chess yesterday.
questions.description: Beat is the past and past participle form of beat.

questions.question: He ………………………….. down to pick up the coin.
questions.description: Bent is the past simple form of bend.

questions.question: The robber was …………………………. to a tree.
questions.description: Bound is the past simple form of bind.

questions.question: I was ………………………….. by the dog.
questions.description: Bitten is the past participle form of bite. The passive forms are made with past participles.

questions.question: The dog …………………………… me while I tried to restrain him.
questions.description: Bit is the past participle form of bite.

questions.question: The injured man ……………………………. to death.
questions.description: Bled is the past simple form of bleed.

questions.question: A breeze ……………………………… gently.
questions.description: Blew is the past simple form of blow.

questions.question: That laptop ……………………………… me six hundred dollars.
questions.description: Cost is the past simple and past participle form of cost.
